caption.title: Difference in each ecological index between the invaded and non-invaded quadrats at Yangyuan, Huailai, Zhangjiakou and Fushun.
caption.p: (A), Abundance; (B), Shannon’s Diversity Index; (C), Margalef’s Richness Index; (D), Species Richness. Mean ± 1 SE ( N = 10). *, P < 0.05, **, P < 0.01, NS, P > 0.05.
